website_summaries.verdict: A premium-looking duck call that comes with an affordable budget price tag. Good all-around call option.
pros: Gold exterior is resistant to scratching and dents
Capable of producing a wide variety of sounds and calls
Takes just a little bit of practice to get the right technique down
cons: May require fine tuning to get the exact type of duck call you need

customer_reviews.title: Best duck sound ever
customer_reviews.text: Should just like a duck my girlfriend says it’s annoying but I love it
customer_reviews.author: Franklyn Le

customer_reviews.title: Great call!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a beginner caller this item is perfect for you. Sounds like a drake from a distance. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Divito

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: All in all this is a decent call for the money. I am not a fan of the tone, a little too deep for me. Sounds ok for greeting calls but the standard quack out of this call doesn't do it for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E.

customer_reviews.title: This is the worse duck call I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the worse duck call I have ever used. I duck hunt and got this as a gift for someone and tried it before I gave it to them and I am glad I did. This call is terrible I did not even give it to them.
customer_reviews.author: ross29

customer_reviews.title: Good price, I bought this as a visual effect ...
customer_reviews.text: As described. Good price, I bought this as a visual effect for when on stage. It will work as expected so I am a happy camper for this item.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: LOUD - CLEAR - STURDY..
customer_reviews.text: LOUD - CLEAR - STURDY.... USED IN MUSICAL PERFORMANCES AND EASILY CAN BE HEARD OVER A 50 PIECE CONCERT BAND. SORRY I HAVE NO IDEA WHAT IT DOES OR DOESN'T DO IN THE "DUCK" WORLD.
customer_reviews.author: PATTY SOBEK

customer_reviews.title: really can't complain
customer_reviews.text: surprisingly easy to blow and i don't have a lot of problem with it freezing up. nice cheap call to add some variety to your calls.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a first call for a friend to ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a first call for a friend to get him used to it, i tried it out and it sounded okay, but nothing special.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Hunt

customer_reviews.title: I blew it and thousands of animals came from all ...
customer_reviews.text: I blew it and thousands of animals came from all over - Ducks, geese, coots, beaver, moose, house cats, bear ... I ate for months.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound and easily put on my lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Very similar to the Duck Commander starter call. Very good sound and easily put on my lanyard.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Powers

customer_reviews.title: This is a great call. My buddy had one when he started ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great call. My buddy had one when he started so i bought 2 for my boys to start calling.
customer_reviews.author: john ross

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: Junk!!! Sounds like crap and I think I could call better without this call I have several others and this sounds more like a distressed rabbit call then a duck I have tried tuning it and even too it to my father in law to have him try cause he's very expierianced and he said it was garbage!
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: best cheap call!
customer_reviews.text: has a good rasp. difficult to blow but works great for hail calls and feeding chuckles... might need tuning before taking it to the field.
customer_reviews.author: Maida

customer_reviews.title: if we are out hunting great, but otherwise annoying LMAO
customer_reviews.text: it's a duck call, if we are out hunting great, but otherwise annoying LMAO
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly P

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs some adjustment to the reed but decent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: William Sherman

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Fell apart in 5 minutes in the duck blind. The other piece went in the water.
customer_reviews.author: Maher Carapetian

customer_reviews.title: Paybacks are heck.
customer_reviews.text: The look of pure fear on my daughter's face when my grandson opened this as part of his birthday gift was priceless. We were all rolling with laughter as he happily quacked away. I can't say how this compares in quality to other brands, but as far as an inexpensive add-on gift for grandchildren living in another state, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Anders

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like a real duck!
customer_reviews.text: It works well...it really sounds like a duck. It's tricky to work at first, but once you master it it sounds great!
customer_reviews.author: Kmoor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandchildren was very happy, and getting better with duck calls . Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Lindvall

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: This call sucks no matter how much you tune it. It is a waste of money I would not prefer buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Af

customer_reviews.title: Mallard Feeding Call
customer_reviews.text: Great for doing the feeding call of the mallard. Try it at a duck pond and I guarantee all the ducks will come your way. Deeper sound.
customer_reviews.author: Geordoctery

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at a Duck Dynasty party! It would probably be good if I was actually a hunter too!
customer_reviews.author: Patch

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 yr old loves this duck call. He hasnt actually been duck hunting but plays with the call around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Duck Call
customer_reviews.text: Haven't actually tried it out but I hope the person I bought it for likes it. Thank you very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

product_meta.title: Flambeau Outdoors 1015L Lohman Gold Series Duck Call, Realistic Waterfowl Call
product_meta.description: A single reed polycarbonate call that gets extremely "ducky" no matter the user's skill level. Lohman's heritage design is built on simplicity and reliability, placing this Gold Series call as an extremely affordable addition to an advanced waterfowler's lanyard for supplemental mellow chuckles and raspy smacks of a content hen or as a young gun's first call. The Lohman Gold Series is a contender that ignores the bells and whistles to focus on simply being an instrument in the hunter's hands that produces the most realistic duck sounds possible—the Lohman "Real Sound".
feature_bullets: REALISTIC DUCK CALL: This imitator produces all of the rich, full tones of a mallard hen from mellow chuckles to raspy smacks
HIGH VOLUME CALL: The Lohman Gold Series Duck Call features an extra loud design for roaring hail strings and commanding comebacks on the open water or field
EASY-TO-USE: An easy-to-use single reed polycarbonate call that gets extremely "ducky" no matter the user's skill level Lohman's heritage design is built on simplicity and reliability

LOHMAN CALLS: The Lohman name has been synonymous with Real Sound since 1937 Featuring authentic and rich tones, rugged construction and designs for hunters of all skill levels, Lohman calls are among the most recognized in the industry
SPECIFICATIONS: Proudly made and hand-tuned in the U S A 100% waterproof call Single reed design
